EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Call Follow Up (1357944494.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Toby, Good to hear from you, hope things are well with you too. Lot’s of new things things have been going on with MBO, I would love to discuss with you via phone. Please schedule a call with me at your convienece by going here <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS>. I look forward to speaking with you! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: John Toby Knudsen [mailto:tobyknudsen@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, January 11, 2013 1:47 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Call Follow Up Hi Sara,
Happy New Year. Hope all is well in your sphere.
Are there any changes or improvements with MBO regarding what it requires or what services it provides since the last time we spoke?
It sticks in my head that MBO does not share a contract with one party, that the consultant and customer are 'blind' to each other's contract. Is this still the case?
Best regards, Toby
617-233-4002On Tue, Apr 3, 2012 at 11:49 AM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Dear Toby , It was a pleasure speaking with you. You’ll find everything that I referenced on our call by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb15brEx4%2FviKJ6fNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We are also promoting our new meet the independents project and are taking applications if you would like to be featured. You can view the program by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/meet-the-independents.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCb15brEx4%2FviKJ6fNmDjBc5TmuLNwY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>.
